TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中包含的 Windows 进度栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 针对在中承载的进行了优化 。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 托管控件的属性和事件的子集在 级别公开，但基础 控件可通过属性完全访问 。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 控件直观地指示长时间操作的进度。A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation. 控件将显示一个条形图，它在操作进行时从左到右填充系统突出显示颜色。The control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses. > [!NOTE] > 控件只能水平定向。The control can only be oriented horizontally. 当应用程序执行任务（例如，复制文件或打印文档）时，通常会使用该控件。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 如果没有视觉提示，应用程序的用户可能会认为应用程序无响应。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 使用 通知用户，应用程序正在执行长时间的任务，且应用程序仍在响应。Use the to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和 属性定义用于表示任务进度的值的范围。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 属性通常设置为零值，并且 属性通常设置为指示任务完成的值。The property is typically set to a value of zero, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要在复制一组文件时正确显示进度，则可以将 属性设置为要复制的文件的总数。For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 属性表示应用程序完成操作的进度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 由于控件中显示的栏是块的集合，因此所显示的值 仅近似于该 属性的当前值。Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the only approximates the property's current value. 根据的大小 ， 属性将确定何时显示下一个块。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block. 除了 直接更改属性以外，还可以通过多种方式来修改显示的值 。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 您可以使用 属性来指定特定的值以便递增 属性，然后调用 方法来递增值。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要更改增量值，可以使用 方法并指定一个值，通过该值来递增 属性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value by which to increment the property. 替换较旧的 控件，但保留该控件以实现向后兼容性。 replaces the older control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 计算斐波那契数字序列的。The following code example demonstrates a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Increment(int32 value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 增加进度栏的当前位置所根据的数量。

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以按特定量递增进度栏的值。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 此递增进度栏的方法类似于将 属性与方法结合使用 。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 属性指定的当前位置 。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用方法后， 属性大于属性的值 ，则属性将 保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在 使用参数中指定的负值调用方法后，属性 `value` 小于属性的值 ，则 属性保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示每次 显示更新之间的延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each display update, in milliseconds.

value.span: 表示延迟的一个整数（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置显示更新的延迟。The property gets or sets the delay of display update. 因此，当您减小属性的值时 ，动画的速度将增加。Therefore, as you decrease the value of the property, the speed of the animation increases.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Maximum : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为此 定义的范围上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定属性的上限 。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 当属性的值更改时，将重新 绘制控件以反映控件的新范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 当属性的值 等于属性的值时 ，将完全填充进度栏。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 您可以使用此属性来指定 属性必须设置为 (的值，方法是设置属性， 或使用 或 方法) 指示操作已完成。You can use this property to specify a value that the property must be set to (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，可以将属性的值设置 为文件复制操作中的文件总数。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 每次复制文件时，都 可以将属性增加1，直到复制文件总数。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied. 此时，将完全填充进度栏。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的 属性 ，该属性用于计算波那契数字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为此 定义的范围下限。

span.span: Gets or sets the lower bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定属性的下限 。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 当属性的值更改时，将重新 绘制控件以反映控件的新范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 当属性的值 等于属性的值时 ，进度条为空。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要更改进度栏的值，请使用 带有方法的属性 ，使用 方法，或直接设置属性的值 。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的 属性 ，该属性用于计算波那契数字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformStep() cil managed

summary.span: 按照 属性的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将进度栏的值增加由属性指定的量 。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 您可以使用 属性来指定操作中每个已完成任务更改进度栏值的量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果要复制一组文件，则可能需要将属性的值设置 为1，并将属性的值设置为 要复制的文件的总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 在复制每个文件时，可以调用 方法，以通过属性的值递增进度栏 。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果希望更灵活地控制进度栏的值，可以使用 方法或直接设置属性的值 。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 属性指定的当前位置 。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用方法后， 属性大于属性的值 ，则属性将 保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在 使用参数中指定的负值调用方法后，属性 `value` 小于属性的值 ，则 属性保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示当 属性设置为 时， 布局是从右向左还是从左向右。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the property is set to .

value.span: 若要在 属性设置为 时打开镜像并从右向左为控件布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the property is set to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制从右到左写入语言的国际应用程序的布局。Use the property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left. 当 属性为 `true` ，并且 属性设置为时 ，将在 Windows 窗体上启用镜像并且控件位置和文本将从右到左。When the property is `true`, and the property is set to , mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftLayoutChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripProgressBar1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripProgressBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#608](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#608)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#608](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#608)]
